column4: hey guys i just got 10.10 installed on my 3,1 macbook, and the trackpad works like shit..anyone found a fix?
you would want to look intot the xf86-input-multitouch driver if your interested, but it's nt finished ye
if you want the repo so you can install it without building from source it can be installed with: sudo add-apt-repository ppa:user/ppa-name && sudo apt-get update
some files failed to download from that
